C

c_coupon.sys.core.beans - package c_coupon.sys.core.beans
The Beans Package consist of Classes defining Objects in order to deliver information from the Application to the DAO which translate those to SQL and JDBC Every major table have it's own Object.
c_SelectHeadersFromAllTables - Class in b_DataBaseCreation
Select Headers From All Tables to Verify tha Data Bases created Successfully
c_SelectHeadersFromAllTables() - Constructor for class b_DataBaseCreation.c_SelectHeadersFromAllTables
 
c_Test_AdminFacade - Class in k_tests
Create a new Company and tries all company Facade actions (create/update/remove/get/get All).
c_Test_AdminFacade() - Constructor for class k_tests.c_Test_AdminFacade
 
checkClientType(CouponClientFacade) - Method in class g_coupon.sys.core.facade.AdminFacade
checkClientType method will check what is the Client type , and return the CouponClientFacade string, example the return value of AdminFacade object is AdminFacade.
closeAllConnections() - Method in class d_coupon.sys.core.connection.ConnectionPool
Closes all connection , and shutdown the application
Company - Class in c_coupon.sys.core.beans
Company class creates a new Company entity
Company(String, String, String) - Constructor for class c_coupon.sys.core.beans.Company
This constructor create a new Company entity using 3 String parameters - Company Name, password, email.
Company(long, String, String, String) - Constructor for class c_coupon.sys.core.beans.Company
This constructor create a new Company entity using - ID parameter and 3 String parameters - Company Name, password, email.
CompanyDAO - Interface in e_coupon.sys.core.dao
CompanyDAO interface describe the Company C.R.U.D (Create,Read,Update,Delete) actions.
CompanyDaoDB - Class in f_coupon.sys.core.dao.db
CompanyDAODB implements the Company C.R.U.D (Create,Read,Update,Delete) actions in the DB using JDBC connection and SQL query.
CompanyDaoDB() - Constructor for class f_coupon.sys.core.dao.db.CompanyDaoDB
 
companyExistById(long) - Method in class f_coupon.sys.core.dao.db.CompanyDaoDB
companyExistById method check whether this Company exist by Id , or not, returns true/false.
companyExistByName(Company) - Method in class f_coupon.sys.core.dao.db.CompanyDaoDB
companyExistByName method check whether this Company exist by Name , or not, returns true/false.
CompanyFacade - Class in g_coupon.sys.core.facade
FACADE - class implements business logic CompanyFACADE class will contain not just the action needed to perform(DAO and DAODB) but also the testing needed to validate the action matches the business logic.
CompanyFacade() - Constructor for class g_coupon.sys.core.facade.CompanyFacade
CompanyFacade Constructor initialing the CompanyDaoDB ,CouponDaoDB classes , to use it later on in the Facade logic.
ConnectionPool - Class in d_coupon.sys.core.connection
ConnectionPool is Singleton Class with limited MAX of 10 Connection.
Coupon - Class in c_coupon.sys.core.beans
Coupon class creates a new Coupon entity

This constructor create a new Coupon entity using 7 parameters.
Coupon(long, String, Date, Date, int, coupontype, String, double, String) - Constructor for class c_coupon.sys.core.beans.Coupon
This constructor create a new Coupon entity using - ID parameter and 7 other parameters.
CouponClientFacade - Interface in g_coupon.sys.core.facade
FACADE - interface will describe the business logic.

couponExistById method check whether this Coupon exist by Id , or not, returns true/false.

couponExistByName method check whether this Coupon exist by Name , or not, returns true/false.

createCompany method used to create a new Company entity in the DB using SQL commands and JDBC.
createCompany(Company) - Method in class f_coupon.sys.core.dao.db.CompanyDaoDB
 
createCompany(Company) - Method in class g_coupon.sys.core.facade.AdminFacade
createCompany method first check if a Company doesn't exist by name, and then create a new Company according to the Java Bean created object.
createCompanyCouponMap(long, long) - Method in class f_coupon.sys.core.dao.db.CompanyDaoDB
createCompanyCouponMap method used to add index reference to the map index table called "company_coupon".
createCoupon(Coupon) - Method in interface e_coupon.sys.core.dao.CouponDAO
createCoupon method used to create a new Coupon entity in the DB using SQL commands and JDBC.
createCoupon(Coupon) - Method in class f_coupon.sys.core.dao.db.CouponDaoDB
 
createCoupon(Company, Coupon) - Method in class g_coupon.sys.core.facade.CompanyFacade
createCoupon method first check if this Coupon doesn't exist in the DB, and this Company exist, then Create a new Coupon and refer it to the Company in the map table COMAPNY_COUPON.
createCustomer(Customer) - Method in interface e_coupon.sys.core.dao.CustomerDAO
createCustomer method used to create a new Customer entity in the DB using SQL commands and JDBC.

createCustomer(Customer) - Method in class g_coupon.sys.core.facade.AdminFacade
createCustomer method first check if a Customer doesn't exist by name, and then create a new Customer according to the Java Bean created object.
createCustomerCouponMap(long, long) - Method in class f_coupon.sys.core.dao.db.CustomerDaoDB
createCustomerCouponMap method add a new reference to the map table customer_coupon , meaning the Customer purchased the Coupon.

CustomerFacade - Class in g_coupon.sys.core.facade
FACADE - class implements business logic CustomerFACADE class will contain not just the action needed to perform(DAO and DAODB) but also the testing needed to validate the action matches the business logic.
